divs: Sighting DetailsLOOK UP NOW! ; THIS REPORT IS WHAT i SAW 30 MIN AGO. iT BOBBED UP AND DOWN AS IT WENT OVER ; MAYBE 1000 FT UP FIRST APPEARED TO BE A STAR THEN I GRABBED BINOCS AND AS IT CAME CLOSER IT clearly appeared TO BE A WHITE BAllon then as it was about to go out of my view over some trees , it moved bak to a clear view location again; so i sent my wife to get the camera. it then quickly bobbled around morphed into 4 baloon looking objects together, one was red; one appeared to be a bright light on front. this thing moved about 4 mph.stopped moved back maybe 1000 ft in a second. that was it ; I was so excited i didn't think about a camera until it was too late. Spring Branch, anyone else see it?
Summary: STAR MORPHING TO WHITE BALLOON THEN TO 4 BALOONS ,TURNED RED W/ LIGHT IN FRONT; ID. TO NYC SIGHTING
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There were no other sightings in Houston on or around December 4th 2010
